hero__title.en: A student who surpassed the teacher

hero__description.uz: Men Bekzod, 13 yoshdaman. Dasturlashga qiziqaman va hozirda Node.js (Express), PostgreSQL, va React PWA bilan ishlayman. Asosan authentication va authorization (JWT, access token, refresh token) kabi xavfsizlik tizimlari ustida ishlayman. Doim yangi texnologiyalarni o‚Äòrganishga intilaman va loyihalarimni takomillashtirishga harakat qilaman.

hero__description.en: My name is Bekzod, I am 13 years old. I‚Äôm passionate about programming and currently work with Node.js (Express), PostgreSQL, and React PWA. I mainly focus on security systems such as authentication and authorization (JWT, access token, refresh token). I always strive to learn new technologies and improve my projects.

about__description.uz: Algoritm o‚Äòquv markazi ‚Äì bu zamonaviy IT bilimlarini o‚Äòrgatishga ixtisoslashgan markaz bo‚Äòlib,o‚Äòquvchilarni dasturlash, web development va IT Kids yo‚Äònalishlarida tayyorlaydi. Biz boshlang‚Äòichdan professionallikka yetaklaydigan dasturlar asosida ta‚Äôlim beramiz.
about__description.en: Algorithm training center is a center specializing in teaching modern IT knowledge, preparing students in programming, web development and IT Kids. We teach according to programs that lead from the initial level to the professional.

about__description2.uz: Bizning maqsadimiz ‚Äì yoshlarni IT sohasiga qiziqtirish, ularga amaliy bilim berish va ularni kelajakda muvaffaqiyatli dasturchi yoki IT mutaxassisiga aylantirish. Biz har bir o‚Äòquvchiga individual yondashib, ularning bilimini mustahkamlashga e‚Äôtibor qaratamiz.
about__description2.en: Our goal is to interest young people in the IT field, give them practical knowledge and turn them into successful programmers or IT specialists in the future. We pay attention to each student individually to strengthen their knowledge.

certificate__error.uz: Siz kiritgan sertifikat raqami to'g'ri emas yoki sertifikat hali ma'lumotlar bazasiga kiritilmagan bo'lishi mumkin. Iltimos, raqamni yana bir bor tekshirib ko'ring yoki biz bilan bog'laning.
certificate__error.en: The certificate number you entered is incorrect or the certificate may not have been entered into the database yet. Please check the number again or contact us.

contact__title.en: We are always in touch with you

contact__description.uz: Biz bilan bog‚Äòlaning, kurslarimiz haqida batafsil ma‚Äôlumot olish yoki o‚Äòquv jarayoni bo‚Äòyicha savollaringizga javob topish uchun. Har doim sizga yordam berishga va to‚Äòg‚Äòri yo‚Äònalish tanlashda ko‚Äòmaklashishga tayyormiz!
contact__description.en: Contact us to get detailed information about our courses or to find answers to your questions about the learning process. We are always ready to help you and assist you in choosing the right direction!

subtitle_consul.en: Leave your phone number, we will call you back and try to answer all your questions

near__course.en: Sign up for our upcoming courses

near__description.uz: Har bir kurs boshlanishdan oldin tanishtiruv dars bo‚Äòlib o‚Äòtadi. Undasiz kurs bo‚Äòyicha barcha ma‚Äòlumotlarga ega bo‚Äòlasiz, o‚Äòqituvchi bilan tanishib olasiz va kursga yozilishingiz mumkin.
near__description.en: Before the start of each course, an introductory lesson is held. During it, you will get all the information about the course, meet the instructor, and be able to enroll in the course.

kurs__uchun_title.en: Fill out the form to register

kurslarbepul_answer.uz: Yo‚Äòq, hozir barcha kurslar pullik. Narxlarni har bir kursning sahifasida ko‚Äòrishingiz mumkin.
kurslarbepul_answer.en: No, currently all courses are paid. You can see the prices on each course's page.

darslar__istagi.en: Can lessons be watched at any time?

dars__description.uz: Ha, sotib olganingizdan so‚Äòng darslarni istalgan vaqtda ko‚Äòrishingiz mumkin.
dars__description.en: Yes, after purchasing, you can watch the lessons at any time.

kurslar__question.en: How long do the courses last?

kurslar__answer.uz: Har bir kursning davomiyligi farq qiladi. Tafsilotlarni kurs sahifasida topishingiz mumkin.
kurslar__answer.en: The duration of each course varies. You can find details on the course page.

material__answer.uz: Ha, kurslar muntazam ravishda yangilanadi va qo‚Äòshimcha materiallar qo‚Äòshiladi.
material__answer.en: Yes, courses are regularly updated, and additional materials are added.

hackathon.title.uz: Hackathonda qatnashish uchun quyidagi ma‚Äôlumotlarni taqdim eting:
hackathon.title.en: Provide the following information to participate in the hackathon:

hackathon.subtitle.uz: Ro‚Äòyxatdan o‚Äòtish muddati va qabul qilinadigan ishtirokchilar soni cheklangan. Arizani imkon qadar tezroq topshiring!
hackathon.subtitle.en: Registration deadline and number of participants are limited. Submit your application as soon as possible!

hackathon.teammembers.subtitle.uz: Har bir a‚Äôzoning ismi va roli

hackathon.rules.subtitle.uz: Ishtirokchilar quyidagi qoidalarga rioya qilishlari shart:
hackathon.rules.subtitle.en: Participants must adhere to the following rules:

hackathon.rules.general.text.uz: Hackathon individual yoki jamoaviy shaklda o‚Äòtkaziladi. Har bir jamoa faqat bitta loyiha taqdim etishi mumkin. Ro‚Äòyxatdan o‚Äòtgan ishtirokchilar faqat o‚Äòz jamoalarida qatnashishi kerak.
hackathon.rules.general.text.en: The hackathon is held individually or in teams. Each team can submit only one project. Registered participants must participate only in their own teams.

hackathon.rules.project.text.uz: Loyiha hackathon davomida ishlab chiqilishi kerak. Oldindan tayyorlangan kodning cheklangan qismi ishlatilishi mumkin, lekin loyiha asosan hackathon davomida yaratilgan bo‚Äòlishi lozim. Loyihalar ochiq manba yoki huquqiy cheklovlarsiz bo‚Äòlishi kerak.
hackathon.rules.project.text.en: The project must be developed during the hackathon. Limited use of pre-written code is allowed, but the project should mostly be created during the event. Projects must be open-source or free from legal restrictions.

hackathon.rules.judging.text.uz: G‚Äòoliblar hakamlar hay‚Äôati tomonidan baholash mezonlariga asoslanib aniqlanadi. Baholash kriteriyalari quyidagilar bo‚Äòlishi mumkin: innovatsion yondashuv, texnik sifati, dizayni va taqdimot sifati. Taqdimot jarayonida loyiha to‚Äòliq ishlashi talab etiladi.
hackathon.rules.judging.text.en: Winners will be determined based on the jury's evaluation criteria. Evaluation may include innovation, technical quality, design, and presentation quality. The project must be fully functional during the presentation.

hackathon.rules.ethics.text.uz: Ishtirokchilar o‚Äòzaro hurmat bilan muomala qilishlari kerak. Plagiat yoki boshqa ishtirokchilarning ishlarini nusxalash qat‚Äôiyan man etiladi. Kiberxavfsizlik qoidalariga rioya qilinishi shart.
hackathon.rules.ethics.text.en: Participants must treat each other with respect. Plagiarism or copying other participants' work is strictly prohibited. Cybersecurity rules must be followed.

hackathon.rules.acceptance.text.uz: Ro‚Äòyxatdan o‚Äòtish orqali ishtirokchilar barcha qoidalarni qabul qilgan hisoblanadi. Hackathon tashkilotchilari istalgan vaqtda qoidalarni o‚Äòzgartirish huquqiga ega.
hackathon.rules.acceptance.text.en: By registering, participants agree to all rules. Hackathon organizers reserve the right to change the rules at any time.

hackathon.rules.note.text.uz: Har qanday qoida buzilishi ishtirokchining diskvalifikatsiya qilinishiga sabab bo‚Äòlishi mumkin.
hackathon.rules.note.text.en: Any rule violation may result in participant disqualification.

hackathon.confirm.terms.uz: Men yuqoridagi shartlarni o‚Äòqidim va ularga to‚Äòliq rozilik bildiraman.
hackathon.confirm.terms.en: I have read and fully agree to the above terms.

hackathon.confirm.info.uz: Ro‚Äòyxatdan o‚Äòtishda taqdim etgan barcha ma‚Äôlumotlarim aniq va to‚Äòg‚Äòri ekanligini tasdiqlayman.
hackathon.confirm.info.en: I confirm that all information provided during registration is accurate and correct.
